summary:
Elwyn
----------------------------------
Location: Solitude - The Winking Skeever
Default Outfit: Farm Clothes
Combat style: Archer
Perk: Overdraw, Critical Shot, Power Shot, Ranger...etc
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/JYnnFlS.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vOj0cBU.jpg[/img][/center]
Hello! My name is YuiH, I am from Taiwan.
So I can only speak a little English, sorry for my poor English

[b]*This mod is stand-alone follower,so you don't need other mods to make her face like my image.*
[/b]
Just when I thinking about I can't create character any more then I got inspired from Tania the Hermit, and I create her,
but this one face is  not very special, I just made her face cutest [b]as possible as I can.[/b][b] 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Y337dP2.jpg[/img]
[/b]
[b][color=#ffff00]*Please show me some screenshot had her in your game if you like this mod, I will be very very appreciated.*[/color][/b]

That's it, I'm done. Or2

[color=#f6b26b][size=5][b][Character]
[/b][/size][/color][b][color=#ffe599][size=4]Elwyn[/size][/color][/b]
 
Body: Height 0.96 Weight 0
Location: Solitude - The Winking Skeever
Default Outfit: Farm Clothes
Combat style: Archer
Perk: Overdraw, Critical Shot, Power Shot, Ranger, Bullseye, Armsman, Agile Defender, Deft Movement

[color=#f6b26b][size=5][b][Knowing issue]
[/b][/size][/color][b][color=#ffff00]Q:[/color][/b] [b]I installed this mod also through NMM, but on my game, she seems to be missing eye and the eyelash textures.[color=#ffd966] [/color][/b]

[b][color=#ff0000]A: [/color][/b]When texture quality is setting to low, her eye textures wouldn't show out, change texture quality to mid or higher then her eye textures will show,
the reason had this issue doesn't find, don't know why this happen, sorry.

[color=#f6b26b][size=5][b][Video]
[/b][/size][/color][youtube]yar9_y1xPGQ[/youtube]
[b][color=#ffff00]Thank to tomze review video !!
[/color][/b][youtube]AeF8ox5JkLk[/youtube]
[b][color=#ffff00]Thank to DomsRPGs review video !!
[/color][/b][youtube]9xfbbW8F1q0[/youtube]
[b][color=#ffff00]Thank to Seriezs review video !![/color][/b]
